amendment.description: To prevent tax increases that would violate President Biden's repeated promise to not impose a single penny in tax increases on people making less than $400,000 per year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3444 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 1. Record Vote Number: 335.

action.text: Amendment SA 3444 proposed by Senator Young. (consideration: CR S6222; text: CR S6222) To prevent tax increases that would violate President Biden's repeated promise to not impose a single penny in tax increases on people making less than $400,000 per year.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3444 proposed by Senator Young.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3444 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 1. Record Vote Number: 335.
